description:
The Linux Foundation has announced the launch of a new initiative named ‘Supporters of Chromium-Based Browsers’. The programme aims to secure sustainable funding and enhance collaborative development for projects within the Chromium ecosystem. Jim Zemlin, Executive Director of the Linux Foundation, commented: “With the launch of the Supporters of Chromium-Based Browsers, we are taking another... Read more »

The post Linux Foundation launches initiative to support Chromium browsers appeared first on Developer Tech News.
title: Linux Foundation launches initiative to support Chromium browsers
